TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IndentedTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 提供可根据 Tab 字符串标记缩进新行的文本编写器。

span.span: Provides a text writer that can indent new lines by a tab string token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展通过提供方法来插入一个制表符字符串，并跟踪当前的缩进级别。 extends a by providing methods that insert a tab string and track the current indentation level. 使用多个缩进级别设置格式的文本可用于生成的代码，因此，此类使用 CodeDOM 代码生成器实现。Text formatted with multiple indentation levels is useful for generated code, so this class is used by CodeDOM code generator implementations. 选项卡字符串为每个缩进组成的字符串。The tab string is the string that each indentation consists of. 通常的选项卡字符串包含空格。Typically the tab string contains white space. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用写入不同级别的缩进的文本。The following code example demonstrates using an to write text at different levels of indentation. [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

for full trust for inheritors.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了编写没有选项卡字符串缩进的行。The following code example demonstrates writing a line without tab string indentations. [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#6)]
